name: The amulet of the Wolf *dark aura*
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It has low armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'critical'.
